flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: My mother and I decided that we needed to begin a business that would help women in our community learn a trade that would last them a lifetime. Clothing for their children and a marketable trade that could be done from their homes. This is our contribution to women in our home town.
guide.introduction_rendered: My mother and I decided that we needed to begin a business that would help women in our community learn a trade that would last them a lifetime. Clothing for their children and a marketable trade that could be done from their homes. This is our contribution to women in our home town.
guide.summary: Making handmade heirlooms, pretty little things, baby clothing and home decor
guide.title: Nanny's Buttons & Beaus
